glsa.title: rsnapshot: Local privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: rsnapshot allows a local user to take ownership of local files, resulting in privilege escalation.

background.p: rsnapshot is a filesystem snapshot utility based on rsync, allowing local and remote systems backups.

description.p: The copy_symlink() subroutine in rsnapshot follows symlinks when changing file ownership, instead of changing the ownership of the symlink itself.

impact.p: Under certain circumstances, local attackers can exploit this vulnerability to take ownership of arbitrary files, resulting in local privilege escalation.

workaround.p: The copy_symlink() subroutine is not called if the cmd_cp parameter has been enabled.
